meta.title: Brikette Hostel in Positano - Affordable Amalfi Coast Stay
meta.description: Book your stay at Positano's only budget hostel with terrace views. Enjoy free Wi-Fi and digital concierge tips. Reserve direct for the best rate.

introSection.title: A Beautiful Home Away From Home
introSection.paragraph1: Hostel Brikette is Positano’s only hostel - budget-friendly, beautifully located, and perfectly placed for exploring the Amalfi Coast.
introSection.paragraph2: We pair unforgettable sea views with the practical comforts you actually need, plus 24/7 local tips via our digital concierge: ferry times, trail advice, restaurant picks...everything you need.
introSection.paragraph3: Choose from social dorms or private rooms—each designed to be simple, comfortable, and easy for your stay.
